alert.note: Alert for Norman (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 03 at 9:23AM CDT until May 04 at 5:02PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... South Branch Buffalo River at Sabin affecting Clay County. Marsh River at Shelly affecting Norman County. Snake River AT Alvarado affecting Marshall County. Snake River below Warren affecting Marshall County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Sand Hill River at Climax affecting Polk County. Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. Wild Rice River (MN) at Hendrum affecting Norman County. Red Lake River at Crookston affecting Polk County. Two Rivers River near Hallock affecting Kittson County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Marsh River at Shelly. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD STAGE. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 14.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 7.9 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
